Name: Glee Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Fighting-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Munchlax and Snorlax.  You can get a Glee Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Snorlax Gasp, a Snorlax Fang, and a Valor Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
